name: innards-out
caption: Innards Out

effect.short: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
effect.full: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

flavorText:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.
